episodes.title: Apna Kamra
episodes.plot: 15-year-old Ritika, amidst the chaos of the Awasthi family, feels the need to have a room of her own. But an unexpected visit from a family guest drastically disturbs her plan.

episodes.title: Party
episodes.plot: It's the new year. Ritika wants to meet her crush. Yet, the seemingly charming boy breaks her heart. On top of her secrecy is about to get disclosed when an unexpected turn of events shows her a way out.

episodes.title: Cable TV
episodes.plot: As Ritika voluntarily becomes the caretaker of the family, with her mother ill, fear of exams come knocking her down. Will she find an unexpected savior?

episodes.title: Parent Teacher Meeting
episodes.plot: The PTM takes an unexpected turn when Ritika's mother, a teacher, is accused of having unworthy children. They decide to prove they are worthy. A moment comes when Ritika has to choose between her ambition and that of her younger brother.

episodes.title: Blank Call
episodes.plot: Ritika has a secret admirer. He crosses the line. She is in a situation where she does not feel comfortable in launching a complaint. A helping hand comes from a direction that Ritika could never have imagined.
